Dialogue:
BJ: Good morning!
AN: Good morning! How can I assist you today?
BJ: What are your plans for today?
AN: Today, I will be going blueberry picking in the afternoon.
BJ: That sounds exciting!
AN: Yes, I discovered a blueberry farm nearby while walking.
BJ: It's great to have such places in the neighborhood. Are blueberries typically in season during summer?
AN: Yes, they are usually in season until the end of August.
BJ: I see. Picking fruit is quite enjoyable, isn't it?
AN: Yes, it is! I also went strawberry picking in the spring.
BJ: You must really enjoy fruit, going that often.
AN: I do. My children also love fruits.
BJ: That's nice. I went grape picking a few years ago.
AN: Were you picking Delaware grapes or Kyoho grapes?
BJ: It was Shine Muscat in Yamanashi.
AN: Shine Muscat is very delicious!
BJ: It was, but I ate so many that I haven't had any since.
AN: It’s rare to get the opportunity to eat that many Shine Muscat grapes.
BJ: Definitely. What’s your favorite fruit?
AN: I like cherries and strawberries.
BJ: Cherries are great. I haven't had them in a while.
AN: I didn't get to eat cherries this year either.
BJ: Fruits can be expensive when you try to buy them.
AN: Yes, cherries are quite a luxury.
BJ: I usually stick to eating bananas daily.
AN: Bananas have become more expensive recently.
BJ: Really? I hadn't noticed.
AN: The price has gone up from around 100 yen to 200 yen.
BJ: That’s quite a hike.
AN: Indeed. I hope prices stabilize soon. Let's wrap up for now.

BJ: Hello!
AN: Hello!
BJ: Is it summer vacation now?
AN: Yes. The children are now on summer vacation.
BJ: Great! Are you going somewhere far?
AN: During the summer, we usually stay nearby. We plan to go camping in September.
BJ: Camping sounds awesome!
AN: I am looking forward to it. Are you going anywhere?
BJ: There are so many places I want to go, but it's tricky now...
AN: These days, it's challenging to go out, isn't it?
BJ: Absolutely. I want to travel abroad.
AN: I understand. It's been three years since my last trip.
BJ: Where did you go last?
AN: My last trip was to Taiwan.
BJ: Taiwan is wonderful! I visited a few years ago too.
AN: The food is great, it's close and affordable. I'd like to go again.
BJ: Did you visit Taipei?
AN: I toured around Taipei and Taichung. Next, I want to go to Tainan.
BJ: Nice! Taiwan does feel familiar.
AN: I agree. I hope an emergency situation in Taiwan does not occur.
BJ: That's true... Peace is the best.
AN: Indeed. Where do you want to travel next overseas?
BJ: Maybe Korea or Vietnam, if it's nearby.
AN: Vietnam sounds excellent. South Korea has already reopened for tourism, right?
BJ: Hmm, I wonder.
AN: I believe so. My husband mentioned there were many tourists on his last business trip.
BJ: Oh! I hope I can go soon. I want restrictions to be lifted quickly.
AN: Yes. If the waiting period is removed, travel will be easier.
BJ: Looking forward to that day. See you!
AN: Yes. Thank you very much!
